entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:50 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
